ModMetaData.name: Transport Downed Pawns
ModMetaData.author: Targhetti original by CornyTrace
ModMetaData.description:
Allows unconscious and otherwise downed colonists and prisoners to be transported in a transport pod.
I didn't create this mod, I only updated it to work with 1.0-1.5 from the source mod.
Original mod by CornyTrace: https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1178057795
